title: Keegan Swenson Wants a Marathon XC World Championship | Velo Podcast
content:
Betsy Welch gets with Swenson to talk about his race season, his world championship aspirations, his affinity for listening to metal on the bike, and more

Read the full article at Keegan Swenson Wants a Marathon XC World Championship | Velo Podcast on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
